additional_info:
Fenced, Communications: electricity, gas, Water, Сanalization 
 Land for sale, 1800 sq.m (the possibility of buying ½ or ⅓ of the land) Grigol Peradze street (Digomi 8). Close to shopping center «Tbilisi Mall» (in 10 min. on foot). The plot is angled, flat, fenced, paved road, three variants of entering, all utilities (electricity, water, gas), developing infrastructure, elite neighborhood, panoramic views over the mountains and the city. Price 94$/sq.m  ///Haggle/// State certificate, all the documents. Owner (not estate agency). WhatsApp and Viber +77019826465 Kazakhstan (Bachi) or +995577500922 Tbilisi (my father Lasha)
